head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHAEFFER, HANS A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHAEFFER, HANS A.

block.p: SCHAEFFER-Hans A. On Wednesday, October 4, 2000. Hans A. Schaeffer of Bethesda, MD, formerly of Linden, NJ. Beloved husband of Lilo Schaeffer; devoted father of Barbara (William) Dagger, Monica (Mitchell) Gorochow and Edward (Liza) Schaeffer; seven grandchildren. Funeral services will be held on Friday, October 6 in Rockville, MD. Memorial contributions may be made to the United Jewish Appeal and U.S. Holocaust Memorial Museum. Edward Sagel Funeral Direction, Inc., Rockville, MD, 800-217-9403.
